trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that can be used to optimize the reloading of a designer.
trans-unit.target: 提供可用于优化重新加载设计器的接口。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> can implement this interface to support optimized reloading by the designer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>可以实现此接口以支持优化重新加载设计器。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>

trans-unit.source: When a designer reparses a file for display, it can use this interface to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 当设计器重新分析显示的文件时，它可以使用此接口来提高性能。

trans-unit.source: To support this performance optimization method, the designer can pass a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit> that represents the document code to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload.ShouldReloadDesigner%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要支持此性能优化方法，设计器可以将传递<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit>表示到的文档代码<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload.ShouldReloadDesigner%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload.ShouldReloadDesigner%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload.ShouldReloadDesigner%2A> returns a value that indicates whether the code has changed and typically, whether your code should reload the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload.ShouldReloadDesigner%2A>返回一个值，该值指示是否已更改代码，通常情况下你的代码是否应重新加载设计器。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload.ShouldReloadDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is unnecessary to spend time reloading the designer.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它是不必要花费时间来重新加载设计器。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the designer should reload in order to import the specified compile unit correctly.
trans-unit.target: 指示设计器是否应重新加载以正确导入指定的编译单元。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> containing the designer document code.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>包含设计器的文档的代码。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer should reload; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应重新加载设计器;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
